column1: [[Tobold Hornblower]] of Longbottom first grew pipe-weed in the Southfarthing about the year {{TA
[[Saruman]], having received reports on [[Gandalf]]’s movements and noting his interest in the Shire, began keeping agents in the Southfarthing in {{TA

The Southfarthing was where [[Lotho Sackville-Baggins]] began his rise to power during the [[War of the Ring]], based on the substantial property in the region that he inherited from his father.<ref>{{RK
column2: VI8}}</ref> Presumably it was he who began exporting pipe-weed to Saruman.

column1: This was the region where most of the Shire's [[pipe-weed]] production was concentrated, in warm sheltered places like [[Longbottom]].<ref>{{FR
column2: Pipeweed}}</ref> Another noted product of the Southfarthing was the strong red wine called [[Old Winyards]].<ref>{{FR
